## JwtService class

Service for creating access/refresh token for user and verify if a token is valid

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class JwtService 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [ACCESS\_EXPIRATION](./clm-core.jwtservice.access_expiration.md) |  | string | Time when the access token expires |
|  [REFRESH\_EXPIRATION](./clm-core.jwtservice.refresh_expiration.md) |  | string | Time when the refresh token expires |
|  [SECRET](./clm-core.jwtservice.secret.md) |  | string | Secret for verifying or creating signature for jwt |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createAccessAndRefreshToken(payload)](./clm-core.jwtservice.createaccessandrefreshtoken.md) |  | Create access- and refresh-token |
|  [createToken(payload, expiration, secret)](./clm-core.jwtservice.createtoken.md) |  | Create a token (consumed by [JwtService.createAccessAndRefreshToken()](./clm-core.jwtservice.createaccessandrefreshtoken.md)<!-- -->) |
|  [verifyToken(token, secret)](./clm-core.jwtservice.verifytoken.md) |  | Verify a token |
